reviewText:
The scenes are as follows:
1. Andie Valentino (~4 minutes, on a black sofa)
2. Karlie Montana (~9 minutes, striptease in an orange room)
3. Cassia Riley and Valentina Vaughn (~9 minutes, showering and sitting in a bathtub)
4. Cassandra Calogera (~8 minutes, striptease in a room with steel doors)
5. Angelica Lane (~8 minutes, striptease in a library)
6. Jenna Haze (~7 minutes, dark room with a winding staircase)
7. Samantha Ryan (~11 minutes, lakeside)

Karlie looks great. All the scenes are exclusive to this release. I didn't check the extras, since there are usually only trailers and a few picture on these.
